madlibs.title: The Office Adventure
madlibs.template: My boss brought a %NOUN% to work today and decided to %VERB% it during our meeting. The entire staff was %ADJECTIVE% about the situation.

madlibs.title: Cooking Disaster
madlibs.template: I tried making dinner but accidentally used a %NOUN% as the main ingredient. I had to %VERB% the entire meal while my date looked %ADJECTIVE%.

madlibs.title: Traffic Troubles
madlibs.template: The traffic was terrible because someone's %NOUN% was in the middle of the highway. Police had to %VERB% around it while angry drivers honked %ADJECTIVE% horns.

madlibs.title: Pet Problems
madlibs.template: My neighbor's pet %NOUN% escaped and began to %VERB% all over my yard. The situation was completely %ADJECTIVE%.

madlibs.title: Weather Warning
madlibs.template: The weatherman predicted a 90% chance of %NOUN% today. He suggested we %VERB% indoors and remain %ADJECTIVE% until further notice.

madlibs.title: Gym Incident
madlibs.template: At the gym, I accidentally dropped a %NOUN% on my foot. I had to %VERB% all the way to the first aid station while everyone looked %ADJECTIVE%.

madlibs.title: Family Reunion
madlibs.template: At the family reunion, Uncle Bob brought his famous %NOUN% and started to %VERB% in front of everyone. Grandma was so %ADJECTIVE% she couldn't stop laughing.

madlibs.title: Job Interview
madlibs.template: During my job interview, a %NOUN% fell out of my pocket. I tried to %VERB% it away, but the interviewer seemed %ADJECTIVE% about the whole thing.

madlibs.title: Doctor Visit
madlibs.template: The doctor said my %NOUN% was perfectly normal, but suggested I don't %VERB% for at least a week. I was feeling rather %ADJECTIVE% about the diagnosis.

madlibs.title: Camping Trip
madlibs.template: On our camping trip, we forgot to pack a %NOUN%. We had to %VERB% one out of sticks and leaves, which was surprisingly %ADJECTIVE%!
